dcterms:creator: M. Everingham
S. M. A. Eslami
L. Van Gool
C. K. I. Williams
J. Winn
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: PASCAL-5i is a benchmark dataset for zero-shot semantic segmentation, consisting of images from PASCAL VOC 2012 and additional annotations. It includes 41,040 training images and 4,000 test images, divided into four sub-datasets with 15 training classes and 5 test classes.
dcterms:title: PASCAL-5i

dcterms:creator: T.-Y. Lin
M. Maire
S. Belongie
J. Hays
P. Perona
D. Ramanan
P. Dollár
C. L. Zitnick
dcterms:description: COCO-20i is a dataset consisting of 12,468 test images from MS COCO 2017, designed for evaluating zero-shot semantic segmentation. It includes 80 classes and is structured into four sub-datasets, each with 60 training classes and 20 test classes.
dcterms:title: COCO-20i

dcterms:creator: M. Everingham
S. M. A. Eslami
L. Van Gool
C. K. I. Williams
J. Winn
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: PASCAL VOC 2012 is a dataset used for object detection and segmentation tasks, containing a diverse set of images with annotations for 20 object classes.
dcterms:title: PASCAL VOC 2012

dcterms:creator: T.-Y. Lin
M. Maire
S. Belongie
J. Hays
P. Perona
D. Ramanan
P. Dollár
C. L. Zitnick
dcterms:description: MS COCO 2017 is a large-scale dataset for object detection, segmentation, and captioning, containing images with complex scenes and multiple objects.
dcterms:title: MS COCO 2017

dcterms:description: PASCAL2COCO is a novel benchmark for zero-shot semantic segmentation that evaluates generalization ability and contains visually challenging samples.
dcterms:title: PASCAL2COCO
